introduction: SYNOPSISMin-ae's stepmother forces her to marry Sung-ho, a neighborhood lad. They go and live nearby a military base town. Due to Sung-ho's wild ways, Min-ae's dreams of a happy newlywed life are crushed. After Min-ae sees Sung-ho meeting with a barmaid, she takes their daughter Kyung-ae and goes to Seoul. Min-ae overcomes much hardship and makes a place for herself and her daughter. However, Sung-ho appears before her and begs for her forgiveness. He asks for money to start a business. Min-ae gets into debt coming up with the money. But it is all a lie. Min-ae has now become a hostess known as Miss Kim at a room salon. There, she meets an architect named Hyun-seok. When Min-ae hears that her daughter, Kyung-ae, is in an orphanage after she was taken by her father, she and Hyun-seok go to get her. They all live happily together. Sung-ho comes again to take Kyung-ae. But when he sees the happy family, Hyun-seok leaves quietly.故事MINAE搬走的邻居宋年轻萨利姆和camptowns因为过着荒淫jeonpae工作在梦中蜜月消失的圣名的火炬继母。MINAE见证种植是正射影像和东京，首尔和遭受亲爱的女儿，但美中不足的是定位。让我们神圣的名字出现不正确的良好祝愿需要提供摆脱债务周或业务的资金，这是假的。现在MINAE是金小姐的沙龙女主人，生命会见那里的善剂。善是圣名就更难过了，MINAE加沙赠送一个女儿崇敬包裹。MINAE不是有一个敬畏孤儿院是采取了和善和三个居住崇敬之情，神圣的名字再次出现，并希望把你女儿的崇敬。但圣名追溯到独自一个美好的家庭。
